misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
description: The use of the MD4 algorithm is not recommended as it is considered broken and should not be used for cryptographic purposes. It is recommended to use a more secure algorithm, such as SHA-256 or SHA-512, instead.
recommendation: Change the value of the `crypto` variable to a more secure algorithm, such as SHA-256 or SHA-512.
